title: CLA Safflower Oil Weight Loss Supplement - 1000mg Conjugated Linoleic Acid for Fat Burning and BMI Lowering
descriptionHtml:
Achieve your weight loss goals with Success Chemistry’s CLA Safflower Oil Supplement. Each softgel contains 1000mg of Conjugated Linoleic Acid (CLA), a natural fatty acid known for its fat-burning and body composition benefits. Formulated to support your diet, this supplement helps reduce body fat while promoting lean muscle mass. Key Benefits:
  • Supports Weight Loss: CLA is scientifically proven to help reduce body fat and improve body composition, making it an ideal companion for your weight loss journey.
  • BMI Lowering: Regular use may assist in lowering your Body Mass Index (BMI), helping you achieve a healthier weight.
  • Fat Burning: Promotes fat oxidation and inhibits fat storage, enhancing your body’s ability to burn stored fat for energy.
  • Natural Diet Support: Made from high-quality safflower oil, our supplement is free from artificial additives and preservatives, ensuring a natural approach to weight management.
  • Convenient Dosage: Each bottle contains 60 softgels, providing a one-month supply when taken as directed for easy incorporation into your daily routine.
Why Choose Success Chemistry CLA Supplement? Our CLA Safflower Oil is formulated for maximum effectiveness, ensuring you receive the benefits of this powerful nutrient. Elevate your weight loss efforts with a natural, safe, and effective supplement from Success Chemistry.
shortDescriptionHtml: Discover Success Chemistry CLA Safflower Oil Weight Loss Supplement. Our 1000mg CLA softgels promote fat burning, lean muscle growth, and metabolism boost. Achieve your weight loss goals naturally.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 Softgel
Servings Per Container: 60

Amount Per Serving / DV%
Calories 10
Calories from fat 10
Total fat 1g 2%**
CLA from Safflower (Carthamus tincorius) Oil 1,000 mg ***
80% Conjugated Linoleic Acid (CLA)

** Based on 2,000 calorie diet
*** Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Gelatin, Glycerin, Purified Water
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
